item.title: Opinion Poll by Ifop–Fiducial for Le Figaro and Sud Radio, 19–20 May 2025 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Parti socialiste–Place Publique (S&D): 0–5 seats

  • Debout la France (ECR): 0 seats
  • Parti communiste français (GUE/NGL): 0 seats
  • Rassemblement national (PfE): 27–34 seats
